snippet.title: YIIK: A Postmodern RPG - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The conspiracies unfold on January 17th 2019 with the arrival of YIIK: A Postmodern RPG, the surreal Japanese-style RPG from Ackk Studios and Ysbryd Games coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Steam. Learn more at http://www.yiikrpg.com

After witnessing a woman vanish from an elevator, college graduate Alex embarks on an adventure to rescue her. As he gathers companions seeking to resolve the truth behind her disappearance, Alex’s search for the woman spirals into an epic quest with stakes higher than he could have ever imagined. 

Traverse dungeons bathed in puzzles, traps and richly saturated colors, while fending off bizarre monsters in a turn-based combat system that blends in twitchy minigames. Brandish records, cameras, musical instruments and more against enemies ranging from floating, yammering skulls to tortoise samurais. 

Follow the developers down the rabbit hole on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/AckkStudios

Buy YIIK on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/459080/YIIK_A_Postmodern_RPG/
Buy YIIK on the Nintendo Eshop!
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/yiik-a-postmodern-rpg-switch
